title: Warden of Vitality
content:
l. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

BG3 Warden of Vitality Information

Description: While this aura lasts, you can cast Restore Vitality as a bonus action to heal yourself or nearby allies. Level: Lvl 3 Spell School: Evocation School Casting Time: Action Range: 18m Requires Concentration: NO Saving Throw: NO

How to Acquire Warden of Vitality in Baldur's Gate 3
